metadata.name: Fragtrap
metadata.description: Bat and fast Wolf are removed, and any amount of damage causes a Big Toss. With Bounty Hunter Flair!
metadata.author: Wecoc, eldri7ch, Mottzilla

goals: Holy glasses + Demon Card + Faerie Card + Bat Card + Sword Card + Ghost Card

alias.comment: Alias Skill of Wolf as Toadstool (Tstool)
